thread.title: Gary Oldman to pay 4th wife $3 million in divorce
thread.title_full: Gary Oldman to pay 4th wife $3 million in divorce

title: Gary Oldman to pay 4th wife $3 million in divorce
text:
Published By: Fox News: Entertainment - Today 
A judge has finalized Oscar-nominated actor Gary Oldman's divorce from his fourth wife after six years of marriage....
